channel.title: Conservation on Hanna
channel.description: Recent content in Conservation on Hanna

item.title: Takeaways from the Wharton Energy Conference
item.description: Since immersing myself into the conservation world, I’ve tried to take every opportunity to learn more so that I can gain a better understanding of the problems we will face in our lifetimes. So with no idea of what to expect and minimal background knowledge on the energy industry, I attended the Wharton Energy Conference.

item.title: Takeaways from the Wharton Energy Conference

item.title: Rob Stewart is my hero.
item.description: Growing up in a land-locked area, I had little exposure to the ocean and the creatures that call it home. So it was a bit unusual that I developed a deep-seated love for the predator of the seas - sharks. The moment I looked past their media-driven reputation as ruthless killers, I discovered their worth.
